column5: Have a great green day   Remember, green beer is not real, stick to Guiness and it will stick to you  Maureen
There are many good reasons for drinking, One has just entered my head. If a man doesn't drink when he's living, How in the hell can he drink when he's dead?   Happy St. Patrick's Day!!
ah green beer day!!!!!...God bless the Irish!!!!!
A great one to you too Maureen.
I think I'll go drink to that.....  Thanks Maureen... and Carole..
364 practise days, ONE ST.Patricks day! Have a happy and song-filled day everyone!!!
